Card.name: Taunt
Card.ability: [Character select]If the power of the selected character is higher than your own The selected character cannot attack other characters except me for 1 turn.

Card.name: Book scavenger
Card.text: All of these books are had an owner
Card.ability: [Any Death] Among the dead character's cards Take the first card they got

Card.name: Security Saver
Card.text: Card? What are you doing in battle?
Card.ability: HP -2 when acquiring a card regardless of team

Card.name: Meat shield
Card.ability: [Active]Reduce 2 HP [In action][Get damaged] Set the damage to 0, and turn off the activation state

Card.name: Sospirando
Card.ability: [Get damaged] Recovers the HP of all teams except yourself by half the damage [Death] All own teams Decrease 4 HP

Card.name: Vivace
Card.ability: [Clash Win] Not self Increases damage equal to the number of cards your team owns, up to the maximum number of cards you own. Every 2 turns, you can give your character 'Faast ([Active] Gain 2 Health, Destroyed)'

Card.name: Furioso
Card.ability: [전투시작] 2턴마다 카운트 상승, 카운트만큼 상대팀의 체력회복(최대 2), 위력감소 [무방비][피해받음]카운트 초기화

Card.name: Feroce
Card.ability: [전투시작] 모든 자신팀들의 위력 +1, 사망한 캐릭터만큼 자신위력 상승 [합 패배] 다음 1턴 모든 자신팀들의 위력 -3,패배해도 이 효과가 발동안함

Card.name: Lamentoso
Card.ability: [획득] 사망한 캐릭터만큼 '플룻'획득, [아무 사망] '플룻'획득 플룻([발동] 효과를 바꾼다 {[피해줌] 피해 1 증가, [피해받음] 피해 1 감소} [전투끝] 효과가 고정됨)
